name: Endangered
description: Aliens are invading Earth and are taking out Earths military assets. Join them in the conquest of planet Earth.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel(R) i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space Additional Notes: Full HD monitor
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8/8.1/10 Processor: Intel(R) i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 50 GB available space Additional Notes: 4K monitor
